entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 30 late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
